name: MPMediaType
desc: The properties for defining the type for a media item.

items.name: static var podcast: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a podcast.

items.name: static var audioBook: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an audio book.

items.name: static var audioITunesU: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an iTunes U audio lesson.

items.name: static var anyAudio: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an unspecified type of audio content.

items.name: static var movie: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a movie.

items.name: static var tvShow: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a TV show.

items.name: static var videoPodcast: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a video podcast.

items.name: static var musicVideo: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a music video.

items.name: static var videoITunesU: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an iTunes U video.

items.name: static var homeVideo: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains a home video.

items.name: static var anyVideo: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an unspecified type of video content.

items.name: static var any: MPMediaType
items.desc: The media item contains an unspecified type of media content.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
